description: Explore the decentralized governance model of Blur, highlighting its components, advantages, and challenges within the digital economy. Discover how Blur's system enhances transparency and inclusivity through blockchain principles, governance tokens, and smart contracts.
keywords: Blur, decentralized governance, blockchain, digital economy, governance tokens, smart contracts, transparency, accountability, decentralized finance, distributed ledger technology
title: Exploring the Decentralized Governance Model of Blur
